game.name: Deep Night Runner
game.shortDescription: 깊은 밤 주자는 밤 넓은 구역을 통해 실행 귀신을 방지하고 동전을 수집하는 흥미 진진한 2 차원 주자입니다. 각각의 새로운 인종,게임은 당신의 능력에 적응,더 어려워진다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Deep night runner is a game for fans of the runner genre that will allow you to enjoy the gameplay endlessly! Run through the night plains, dodge ghosts and collect coins on your way

reviewHighlights.text: I highly do not recommend. For this price, Steam is full of games that are several times better than this garbage.
Pretty funny simple analog mix of mario and flappy bird. We run and collect coins, dodging obstacles. It's a pity You can't change the volume inside t...
